thread.section_title: Plaza Opera Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2 nights city break
thread.title_full: 2 nights city break - Review of Plaza Opera Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: barrymallon
title: 2 nights city break
text: Seeing paris on a budget and this hotel was perfect for us it was central with good excess to public transport, staff more than happy to help (I speak no French at all) rooms are a bit small, but you are in the center of the city so this should be expected. If I was to go back to Paris again I would happily stay here again
